title.en: Billowing Clouds of Faith: A Prayer

text.en: The blessings of the Mañjughoṣa Guru entered your heart,
Dharma nectar caused the lotus of intelligence to bloom,
And you raised the victory banner of nonsectarian teachings—
text.en-trans: rimé tenpé gyaltsen dreng nyi la

text.en: From the depths of my heart, I pray to you: inspire me with your blessings.
text.en-trans: nying né soldeb dak gyü jingyi lob

text.en: You gained critical the strength of insight into the textual tradition
text.en-trans: tsug lagtawé namchö tu drub ching

text.en: And loudly proclaimed the vajra laughter of scripture and reasoning.
To you, the illuminator of the teachings of Kinsman of the Sun,1
I pray from the depths of my heart: inspire me with your blessings.
text.en-trans: nying né soldeb dak gyü jingyi lob

text.en: Mighty lord of speech, whose great strength of heart
Is like that of valiant Mañjuśrī and who, with a leonine roar
Of fine explanation, vanquishes the beasts of erroneous views,
May you remain forever indestructible as the seven vajra properties.
